vulnerability.name: USN-4352-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4352-1 fixed a vulnerability in OpenLDAP. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled certain queries. A  remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OpenLDAP to consume  resources, resulting in a denial of service.

statements.status_notes: OpenLDAP could be made to crash if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
